name: Calling Mr. Blacksmith
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 32 Theme: An Unconventional Weapon

Go down a dungeon filled with deadly monsters. Call your blacksmith to come down and craft a weapon out of the stuff you find on your way.

Comments:

  • "This game is very clever however and despite my lack of skills I really did enjoy this as more of a challenge. Great work!" -RobotHoboDanceParty
  • "That nice Dwarf Fortress feeling, excellent!" -siryakko
  • "Love it. it's hard, but addictive." -sbot1101

Controls:

NumPad / Vi-Keys Movement ? / (H Ludum Dare Version) Help I Inventory C Craft / combine / call blacksmith E Equip a different weapon S Show enemy stats and info A Choose in altar menu R Kill yourself
